name: Sweet Suffering
description:
Game Introduction

Due to the humble nature of Sweetheart (the protagonist), she was granted the opportunity to travel among the Dessert Heaven. Unfortunately, this paradise is about to meet its own demise, as the girl is a gluttonous airhead, with an unquenchable appetite for anything remotely sweet. Journey along this helpless world as Sweetheart devours everything in her path.

Sweet Suffering is an Action-Adventure game where the player utilizes the power of sugar rush to defeat and devour dessert creatures. Player can punch or throw props at the enemies to drop their toppings. Eating the toppings with enable player to enter sugar rush mode, which gives access to a spork weapon with two distinct move sets, allowing the player to go on a rampage.
